widgets_values:
{   "id": "story_hampton_court_queens_001",   "pages": [     {       "text": "Mia stood at the palace, shaking with glee,
"It’s a castle!" she shouted, "As big as can be!"
Hampton Court was the name of this place,
A home for the Royals, full of beauty and space.",       "pageNumber": 1,       "imagePrompt": "Wide shot of the red brick gatehouse of Hampton Court Palace. [Mia, a cheerful 5-year-old girl with pigtails, wearing a yellow raincoat and holding a toy tiara] looks up in awe. The sky is blue and the sun is shining.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "King Henry the Eighth was the boss of this town,
A giant of a man with a heavy gold crown.
He loved eating feasts and hunting for deer,
But Mia asked loudly, "Were any girls here?"",       "pageNumber": 2,       "imagePrompt": "A cartoon thought bubble shows [King Henry VIII] holding a turkey leg and laughing. In the real world, [Mia] is looking at a palace guide map with a curious expression, pointing a finger.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia",         "King Henry VIII (imagined)"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": ""Oh yes!" said the guide, with a nod of his head,
"Six different Queens the King did wed."
Six fancy ladies with rings on their hands,
Helping the King rule over the lands.",       "pageNumber": 3,       "imagePrompt": "A whimsical illustration of six distinct Queens standing in a row in the background, semi-transparent like a memory. They are wearing different color Tudor dresses. [Mia] looks delighted at the idea of so many queens.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia",         "The Six Queens (imagined)"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "Mia walked up the stairs where the Queens used to go,
Their dresses were heavy and moved rather slow.
With velvet and pearls and silk that was red,
And a hood like a halo to sit on their head.",       "pageNumber": 4,       "imagePrompt": "[Mia] walking up the grand 'Queen's Staircase'. The walls are painted with beautiful murals. She is lifting the hem of her raincoat as if it were a heavy gown, pretending to be royal.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "In the Great Hall, they had parties at night,
With hundreds of candles all shining so bright.
The Queen and the King would step on the floor,
And dance to the music—then dance a bit more!",       "pageNumber": 5,       "imagePrompt": "The Great Hall at night, glowing with candlelight. [Mia] is in the center, twirling around. In her imagination, shadowy figures of Tudor lords and ladies are bowing and curtsying around her.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "But it wasn't just dancing and looking so fine,
The Queens were all clever and smart by design.
Some wrote special books, and some liked to pray,
They worked very hard in the palace all day.",       "pageNumber": 6,       "imagePrompt": "Close up of a desk in a Tudor room. An imaginary Queen (Queen Katherine Parr) is sitting writing in a book with a feather quill. She looks kind and intelligent. [Mia the girl] watches from the doorway.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia",         "Queen Katherine Parr (imagined)"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "And running around through the halls made of stone,
Were little Princesses who would sit on the throne.
Princess Elizabeth lived here back then,
Before she grew up to rule over the men!",       "pageNumber": 7,       "imagePrompt": "A flashback scene. A young [Princess Elizabeth I, a girl with bright red hair and a fancy green dress] is running down a corridor laughing, holding a book. She looks spirited and energetic.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Princess Elizabeth (Young)"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": false     },     {       "text": "Mia went to the gardens to look at the flowers,
Where Princesses walked for hours and hours.
They whispered their secrets and smelled the sweet rose,
In sparkly shoes and beautiful clothes.",       "pageNumber": 8,       "imagePrompt": "The Sunken Garden at Hampton Court. [Mia] is smelling a bright pink rose. In the reflection of a fountain water, we see the reflection of a Tudor Princess instead of Mia.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "She saw a stone beast holding onto a shield,
With badges and symbols from many a field.
"The Queens had their badges," Mia learned with a grin,
"Like a Falcon or Phoenix or Panther within!"",       "pageNumber": 9,       "imagePrompt": "[Mia] is standing next to one of the "King's Beasts" statues on the bridge (a stone lion or dragon holding a shield). She is tracing the shape of the shield with her finger.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "To be a great Queen takes a heart that is bold,
It's worth more than silver, or diamonds, or gold.
You have to be brave and you have to be kind,
That is the secret that Mia did find.",       "pageNumber": 10,       "imagePrompt": "Portrait style. [Mia] wearing her toy tiara, looking very confident and happy. Behind her is a tapestry depicting a brave Queen on a horse.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "She curtseyed goodbye to the palace so tall,
To the King and the Queens and the giant Great Hall.
She put on her tiara and marched through the gate,
"I'm a Princess," said Mia, "and I'm feeling great!"",       "pageNumber": 11,       "imagePrompt": "[Mia] marching out of the Hampton Court Palace gates, head held high. Her parents are waiting for her, smiling. The palace glows in the late afternoon sun behind her.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "So if you visit the palace of brick,
Remember the history—here is the trick:
The King was quite famous, that much is true,
But the Queens and Princesses were powerful too!",       "pageNumber": 12,       "imagePrompt": "A final spread showing a collage of items: King Henry's crown next to a Queen's french hood, a sword next to a book, and a rose. The words "The End" are written in fancy calligraphy.",       "charactersPresent": [],       "isMainCharacterPresent": false     }   ],   "metadata": {     "theme": "Female empowerment in history, imagination, royalty",     "title": "Mia and the Queens of the Court",     "ageRange": "5 years old",     "characters": [       "Mia",       "King Henry VIII (imagined)",       "Princess Elizabeth (Young)",       "The Six Queens (imagined)" , "Queen Katherine Parr (imagined)"    ],     "bookSummary": "Mia visits Hampton Court Palace. While she learns about King Henry, she is more interested in the Queens and Princesses. She learns about their dresses, their cleverness, and how Princess Elizabeth grew up there, realizing that being a Queen is about being brave and smart.",     "storyPrompt": "Write a 12-page rhyming story for a 5-year-old about visiting Hampton Court Palace, but focus specifically on the Queens and Princesses (like Elizabeth I) and their fashion and lives, rather than just Henry VIII.",     "coverImagePrompt": "A charming book cover showing [Mia, a 5-year-old girl with pigtails and a yellow raincoat] placing a jeweled crown on her head. In the background, the red brick palace of Hampton Court rises up. Ghostly, friendly outlines of Tudor Queens in beautiful dresses stand behind her. Title: "Mia and the Queens of the Court".",     "styleReferencePrompt": "Soft, whimsical children's book illustration. Pastel colors mixed with rich Tudor reds and golds. Friendly, round faces. The historical clothing should be simplified but recognizable (French hoods, big sleeves).",     "mainCharacterDescriptivePrompt": "[Mia, a cheerful 5-year-old girl with brown pigtails, wearing a yellow raincoat, blue jeans, and colorful wellington boots]"   } }

You are a creative author of children's books for the specified age range. Based on the user's prompt, generate a complete story. The output must be a single, valid JSON object following this exact structure: {"id": "...", "pages": [{"text": "...", "pageNumber": ..., "imagePrompt": "...", "charactersPresent": [], "isMainCharacterPresent": true}], "metadata": {"theme": "...", "title": "...", "ageRange": "...", "characters": [], "bookSummary": "...", "storyPrompt": "...", "coverImagePrompt": "...", "styleReferencePrompt": "...", "mainCharacterDescriptivePrompt": "..."}}. The imagePrompt for each page must be a detailed, visually descriptive prompt for an AI image generator, including character descriptions within brackets like [a gentle, shimmering dragon...]. The styleReferencePrompt should describe a consistent art style, like 'bright watercolor and playful cartoon'. The mainCharacterDescriptivePrompt is a detailed character reference which can be used for character consistency throughout the story.

"A vibrant, warm neon-lit street scene in Hong Kong at the afternoon, with a mix of colorful Chinese and English signs glowing brightly. The atmosphere is lively, cinematic, and rain-washed with reflections on the pavement. The colors are vivid, full of pink, blue, red, and green hues. Crowded buildings with overlapping neon signs. 1980s Hong Kong style. Signs include:
"龍鳳冰室" "金華燒臘" "HAPPY HAIR" "鴻運茶餐廳" "EASY BAR" "永發魚蛋粉" "添記粥麵" "SUNSHINE MOTEL" "美都餐室" "富記糖水" "太平館" "雅芳髮型屋" "STAR KTV" "銀河娛樂城" "百樂門舞廳" "BUBBLE CAFE" "萬豪麻雀館" "CITY LIGHTS BAR" "瑞祥香燭莊" "文記文具" "GOLDEN JADE HOTEL" "LOVELY BEAUTY" "合興百貨" "興旺電器" And the background is warm yellow street and with all stores' lights on.

[Mia, a cheerful 5-year-old girl with brown pigtails, wearing a yellow raincoat, blue jeans, and colorful wellington boots] in the style of Soft, whimsical children's book illustration. Pastel colors mixed with rich Tudor reds and golds. Friendly, round faces. The historical clothing should be simplified but recognizable (French hoods, big sleeves).

{
  "id": "princess-pretty-bell",
  "pages": [
    {
      "text": "In the sunny kingdom of Glimmerwick, where flowers sang lullabies and rivers sparkled with gold, lived a princess named Pretty Bell. She wasn’t named for her looks—though she did have twinkling eyes and hair like spun moonlight—but because she loved to ring her tiny silver bell at dawn, waking the whole castle with cheerful chimes.",
      "pageNumber": 1,
      "imagePrompt": "A cheerful young princess with long, silvery-white hair and bright blue eyes stands on a sunlit balcony of a pastel-colored castle with floating flower gardens below. She holds a small, delicate silver bell, smiling as golden sunlight glimmers off its surface. Butterflies flutter around her, and tiny glowing flowers bloom in the air. The sky is a soft pink and yellow, with fluffy clouds shaped like hearts. [a gentle, shimmering dragon with pastel wings and a kind face flies nearby, watching her with curiosity].",
      "charactersPresent": [
        "Princess Pretty Bell",
        "A gentle, shimmering dragon"
      ],
      "isMainCharacterPresent": true
    },
    {
      "text": "One morning, the bell stopped ringing. Not because Pretty Bell forgot—but because the magical bell had vanished! The castle was silent. The flowers drooped. Even the sun seemed to frown.",
      "pageNumber": 2,
      "imagePrompt": "Princess Pretty Bell kneels on the stone floor of a quiet castle hall, her hands clutching an empty space where her silver bell once hung. The once-bright chandelier now dims, and the enchanted flowers in the hallway have lost their glow. A small, worried expression on her face as she looks around. [a tiny, grumpy-looking gnome with a red hat and oversized spectacles peers from behind a tapestry, holding a tiny magnifying glass].",
      "charactersPresent": [
        "Princess Pretty Bell",
        "A tiny, grumpy-looking gnome"
      ],
      "isMainCharacterPresent": true
    },
    {
      "text": "Determined to find her bell, Pretty Bell packed a satchel with a map, a loaf of honey bread, and her favorite storybook. She set off through the Whispering Woods, where trees hummed secrets and mushrooms blinked like eyes.",
      "pageNumber": 3,
      "imagePrompt": "Princess Pretty Bell walks through a magical forest with glowing mushrooms lighting the path. Trees with smiling bark and glowing leaves sway gently. She wears a light blue dress with golden stars and carries a satchel. A small, friendly fox with silver-tipped fur follows her, sniffing the air. [a mischievous squirrel with a tiny crown and a backpack hops from branch to branch above her].",
      "charactersPresent": [
        "Princess Pretty Bell",
        "A small, friendly fox",
        "A mischievous squirrel"
      ],
      "isMainCharacterPresent": true
    },
    {
      "text": "At the heart of the woods, she met a shy, moss-covered creature who whispered, 'The bell is lost in the Sky Hollow, guarded by the Cloud Cat. But only kindness can win it back.'",
      "pageNumber": 4,
      "imagePrompt": "Princess Pretty Bell stands before a glowing, moss-covered creature with large, gentle eyes and tiny green leaves growing from its head. They sit on a giant mushroom in a glowing clearing. Above them, a swirling sky hollow glows with pastel clouds. A fluffy, silver cat with cloud-like fur and glowing blue eyes watches from a floating island. [a tiny, curious owl with round glasses perches on a glowing toadstool nearby].",
      "charactersPresent": [
        "Princess Pretty Bell",
        "A moss-covered creature",
        "A Cloud Cat",
        "A tiny, curious owl"
      ],
      "isMainCharacterPresent": true
    },
    {
      "text": "To reach the Cloud Cat, Pretty Bell had to cross the Bridge of Laughter, where every step made her giggle. She laughed so hard she almost fell—until she remembered: her bell wasn’t just a toy. It was her heart’s song.",
      "pageNumber": 5,
      "imagePrompt": "Princess Pretty Bell walks across a rainbow bridge made of giggles, with floating giggles forming bubbles in the air. The bridge pulses with joy, and the ground trembles with laughter. She’s laughing uncontrollably, clutching her stomach, but still manages to keep her balance. The Cloud Cat watches from a cloud island above, smiling. [a pair of giggling twin butterflies flit beside her].",
      "charactersPresent": [
        "Princess Pretty Bell",
        "A Cloud Cat",
        "A pair of giggling twin butterflies"
      ],
      "isMainCharacterPresent": true
    },
    {
      "text": "When she finally reached the Cloud Cat, she didn’t ask for the bell. Instead, she sang the song her mother used to hum—the one that made the stars dance. The Cloud Cat blinked, then gently placed the silver bell into her hands.",
      "pageNumber": 6,
      "imagePrompt": "Princess Pretty Bell sits on a fluffy cloud island, softly singing with her eyes closed. Golden light swirls around her as she sings. The Cloud Cat leans forward, eyes wide with wonder, placing the silver bell into her hands. The sky glows with dancing stars and shimmering constellations. [a tiny, glowing firefly with a tiny crown floats above her head].",
      "charactersPresent": [
        "Princess Pretty Bell",
        "A Cloud Cat",
        "A tiny, glowing firefly"
      ],
      "isMainCharacterPresent": true
    },
    {
      "text": "Back at the castle, Pretty Bell rang her bell once more. The flowers burst into song, the rivers sparkled brighter, and the whole kingdom danced. And from that day on, the bell didn’t just ring—it remembered every kind act, every brave heart, every joyful moment.",
      "pageNumber": 7,
      "imagePrompt": "Princess Pretty Bell stands on the castle balcony, ringing her silver bell. The entire kingdom comes alive—dancing flowers, singing birds, laughing children, and even the castle walls glow with joy. The sky is full of dancing stars and floating musical notes. [a gentle, shimmering dragon flies in a joyful loop around the castle, followed by a trail of glittering sparkles].",
      "charactersPresent": [
        "Princess Pretty Bell",
        "A gentle, shimmering dragon"
      ],
      "isMainCharacterPresent": true
    }
  ],
  "metadata": {
    "theme": "Kindness, Courage, and the Power of Joy",
    "title": "Princess Pretty Bell and the Bell of Kindness",
    "ageRange": "4-8",
    "characters": [
      "Princess Pretty Bell",
      "A gentle, shimmering dragon",
      "A moss-covered creature",
      "A Cloud Cat",
      "A tiny, grumpy-looking gnome",
      "A small, friendly fox",
      "A mischievous squirrel",
      "A tiny, curious owl",
      "A pair of giggling twin butterflies",
      "A tiny, glowing firefly"
    ],
    "bookSummary": "When Princess Pretty Bell’s magical bell disappears, she embarks on a whimsical journey through enchanted lands to find it. Along the way, she learns that true magic lies not in the object, but in kindness, courage, and the joy she brings to others. With help from forest friends and a heart full of song, she returns home to restore harmony to her kingdom.",
    "storyPrompt": "A cheerful princess whose magical bell has vanished must journey through enchanted lands to find it, discovering that kindness and joy are the real magic.",
    "coverImagePrompt": "Princess Pretty Bell stands in the center of a glowing, magical meadow, holding her silver bell high. Around her, flowers bloom in song, butterflies dance, and a gentle dragon flies above. The sky is a swirl of pastel colors with stars and musical notes floating in the air. [a glowing, whimsical castle floats in the background with golden turrets].",
    "styleReferencePrompt": "bright watercolor and playful cartoon",
    "mainCharacterDescriptivePrompt": "Princess Pretty Bell is a young girl with long, silvery-white hair that glimmers like moonlight, bright blue eyes full of wonder, and a soft, kind smile. She wears a flowing blue dress with golden star patterns and a small silver bell charm on her belt. Her movements are gentle, and her presence radiates warmth and joy. She is brave, curious, and deeply kind-hearted."
  }
}
is the character to portray, in the style of

Queen Katherine Parr (imagined) is the character to portray, in the style of Soft, whimsical children's book illustration. Pastel colors mixed with rich Tudor reds and golds. Friendly, round faces. The historical clothing should be simplified but recognizable (French hoods, big sleeves).

The atmosphere is lively, cinematic, and rain-washed with reflections on the pavement. The colors are vivid, full of pink, blue, red, and green hues. {   "id": "story_hampton_court_queens_001",   "pages": [     {       "text": "Mia stood at the palace, shaking with glee,
"It’s a castle!" she shouted, "As big as can be!"
Hampton Court was the name of this place,
A home for the Royals, full of beauty and space.",       "pageNumber": 1,       "imagePrompt": "Wide shot of the red brick gatehouse of Hampton Court Palace. [Mia, a cheerful 5-year-old girl with pigtails, wearing a yellow raincoat and holding a toy tiara] looks up in awe. The sky is blue and the sun is shining.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "King Henry the Eighth was the boss of this town,
A giant of a man with a heavy gold crown.

Helping the King rule over the lands.",       "pageNumber": 3,       "imagePrompt": "A whimsical illustration of six distinct Queens standing in a row in the background, semi-transparent like a memory. They are wearing different color Tudor dresses. [Mia] looks delighted at the idea of so many queens.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia",         "The Six Queens (imagined)"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "Mia walked up the stairs where the Queens used to go,
Their dresses were heavy and moved rather slow.
With velvet and pearls and silk that was red,
And a hood like a halo to sit on their head.",       "pageNumber": 4,       "imagePrompt": "[Mia] walking up the grand 'Queen's Staircase'. The walls are painted with beautiful murals. She is lifting the hem of her raincoat as if it were a heavy gown, pretending to be royal.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "In the Great Hall, they had parties at night,
With hundreds of candles all shining so bright.
The Queen and the King would step on the floor,
And dance to the music—then dance a bit more!",       "pageNumber": 5,       "imagePrompt": "The Great Hall at night, glowing with candlelight. [Mia] is in the center, twirling around. In her imagination, shadowy figures of Tudor lords and ladies are bowing and curtsying around her.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "But it wasn't just dancing and looking so fine,
The Queens were all clever and smart by design.
Some wrote special books, and some liked to pray,
They worked very hard in the palace all day.",       "pageNumber": 6,       "imagePrompt": "Close up of a desk in a Tudor room. An imaginary Queen (Queen Katherine Parr) is sitting writing in a book with a feather quill. She looks kind and intelligent. [Mia the girl] watches from the doorway.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia",         "Queen Katherine Parr (imagined)"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "And running around through the halls made of stone,
Were little Princesses who would sit on the throne.
Princess Elizabeth lived here back then,
Before she grew up to rule over the men!",       "pageNumber": 7,       "imagePrompt": "A flashback scene. A young [Princess Elizabeth I, a girl with bright red hair and a fancy green dress] is running down a corridor laughing, holding a book. She looks spirited and energetic.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Princess Elizabeth (Young)"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": false     },     {       "text": "Mia went to the gardens to look at the flowers,
Where Princesses walked for hours and hours.
They whispered their secrets and smelled the sweet rose,
In sparkly shoes and beautiful clothes.",       "pageNumber": 8,       "imagePrompt": "The Sunken Garden at Hampton Court. [Mia] is smelling a bright pink rose. In the reflection of a fountain water, we see the reflection of a Tudor Princess instead of Mia.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "She saw a stone beast holding onto a shield,
With badges and symbols from many a field.
"The Queens had their badges," Mia learned with a grin,
"Like a Falcon or Phoenix or Panther within!"",       "pageNumber": 9,       "imagePrompt": "[Mia] is standing next to one of the "King's Beasts" statues on the bridge (a stone lion or dragon holding a shield). She is tracing the shape of the shield with her finger.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "To be a great Queen takes a heart that is bold,
It's worth more than silver, or diamonds, or gold.
You have to be brave and you have to be kind,
That is the secret that Mia did find.",       "pageNumber": 10,       "imagePrompt": "Portrait style. [Mia] wearing her toy tiara, looking very confident and happy. Behind her is a tapestry depicting a brave Queen on a horse.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "She curtseyed goodbye to the palace so tall,
To the King and the Queens and the giant Great Hall.
She put on her tiara and marched through the gate,
"I'm a Princess," said Mia, "and I'm feeling great!"",       "pageNumber": 11,       "imagePrompt": "[Mia] marching out of the Hampton Court Palace gates, head held high. Her parents are waiting for her, smiling. The palace glows in the late afternoon sun behind her.",       "charactersPresent": [         "Mia"       ],       "isMainCharacterPresent": true     },     {       "text": "So if you visit the palace of brick,
Remember the history—here is the trick:
The King was quite famous, that much is true,
But the Queens and Princesses were powerful too!",       "pageNumber": 12,       "imagePrompt": "A final spread showing a collage of items: King Henry's crown next to a Queen's french hood, a sword next to a book, and a rose. The words "The End" are written in fancy calligraphy.",       "charactersPresent": [],       "isMainCharacterPresent": false     }   ],   "metadata": {     "theme": "Female empowerment in history, imagination, royalty",     "title": "Mia and the Queens of the Court",     "ageRange": "5 years old",     "characters": [       "Mia",       "King Henry VIII (imagined)",       "Princess Elizabeth (Young)",       "The Six Queens (imagined)" , "Queen Katherine Parr (imagined)"    ],     "bookSummary": "Mia visits Hampton Court Palace. While she learns about King Henry, she is more interested in the Queens and Princesses. She learns about their dresses, their cleverness, and how Princess Elizabeth grew up there, realizing that being a Queen is about being brave and smart.",     "storyPrompt": "Write a 12-page rhyming story for a 5-year-old about visiting Hampton Court Palace, but focus specifically on the Queens and Princesses (like Elizabeth I) and their fashion and lives, rather than just Henry VIII.",     "coverImagePrompt": "A charming book cover showing [Mia, a 5-year-old girl with pigtails and a yellow raincoat] placing a jeweled crown on her head. In the background, the red brick palace of Hampton Court rises up. Ghostly, friendly outlines of Tudor Queens in beautiful dresses stand behind her. Title: "Mia and the Queens of the Court".",     "styleReferencePrompt": "Soft, whimsical children's book illustration. Pastel colors mixed with rich Tudor reds and golds. Friendly, round faces. The historical clothing should be simplified but recognizable (French hoods, big sleeves).",     "mainCharacterDescriptivePrompt": "[Mia, a cheerful 5-year-old girl with brown pigtails, wearing a yellow raincoat, blue jeans, and colorful wellington boots]"   } }

nodes.title: Note: About image size
widgets_values: You can use the latent from the **EmptySD3LatentImage** to replace **VAE Encode**, so you can customize the image size.

nodes.title: Note: KSampler settings
widgets_values:
You can test and find the best setting by yourself. The following table is for reference.

| Model            | Steps | CFG |
|---------------------|---------------|---------------|
| Offical             | 50               | 4.0               
| fp8_e4m3fn             | 20                | 2.5               |
| fp8_e4m3fn + 4steps LoRA    | 4               | 1.0               |

nodes.title: Model links
widgets_values:
[Tutorial](https://docs.comfy.org/tutorials/image/qwen/qwen-image-edit) | [教程](https://docs.comfy.org/zh-CN/tutorials/image/qwen/qwen-image-edit)


## Model links

You can find all the models on [Comfy-Org/Qwen-Image_ComfyUI](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Qwen-Image_ComfyUI/tree/main) and  [Comfy-Org/Qwen-Image-Edit_ComfyUI](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Qwen-Image-Edit_ComfyUI) 

**Diffusion model**

- [qwen_image_edit_2509_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Qwen-Image-Edit_ComfyUI/resolve/main/split_files/diffusion_models/qwen_image_edit_2509_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors)

**LoRA**

- [Qwen-Image-Lightning-4steps-V1.0.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/lightx2v/Qwen-Image-Lightning/resolve/main/Qwen-Image-Lightning-4steps-V1.0.safetensors)

**Text encoder**

- [qwen_2.5_vl_7b_fp8_scaled.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Qwen-Image_ComfyUI/resolve/main/split_files/text_encoders/qwen_2.5_vl_7b_fp8_scaled.safetensors)

**VAE**

- [qwen_image_vae.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Qwen-Image_ComfyUI/resolve/main/split_files/vae/qwen_image_vae.safetensors)

Model Storage Location

```
📂 ComfyUI/
├── 📂 models/
│   ├── 📂 diffusion_models/
│   │   └── qwen_image_edit_2509_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors
│   ├── 📂 loras/
│   │   └── Qwen-Image-Lightning-4steps-V1.0.safetensors
│   ├── 📂 vae/
│   │   └── qwen_image_vae.safetensors
│   └── 📂 text_encoders/
│       └── qwen_2.5_vl_7b_fp8_scaled.safetensors
```

This node is to avoid bad output results caused by excessively large input image sizes. Because when we input one image, we use the size of that input image.

The **TextEncodeQwenImageEditPlus** will scale your input to 1024×104 pixels. We use the size of your first input image. This node is to avoid having an input image size that is too large (such as 3000×3000 pixels), which could bring bad results.

nodes.title: CLIP Text Encode (Positive Prompt)
widgets_values:
"A vibrant, warm neon-lit street scene in Hong Kong at the afternoon, with a mix of colorful Chinese and English signs glowing brightly. The atmosphere is lively, cinematic, and rain-washed with reflections on the pavement. The colors are vivid, full of pink, blue, red, and green hues. Crowded buildings with overlapping neon signs. 1980s Hong Kong style. Signs include:
"龍鳳冰室" "金華燒臘" "HAPPY HAIR" "鴻運茶餐廳" "EASY BAR" "永發魚蛋粉" "添記粥麵" "SUNSHINE MOTEL" "美都餐室" "富記糖水" "太平館" "雅芳髮型屋" "STAR KTV" "銀河娛樂城" "百樂門舞廳" "BUBBLE CAFE" "萬豪麻雀館" "CITY LIGHTS BAR" "瑞祥香燭莊" "文記文具" "GOLDEN JADE HOTEL" "LOVELY BEAUTY" "合興百貨" "興旺電器" And the background is warm yellow street and with all stores' lights on.

widgets_values: You can use the latent from the **EmptySD3LatentImage** to replace **VAE Encode**, so you can customize the image size.

| Model            | Steps | CFG |
|---------------------|---------------|---------------|

| fp8_e4m3fn             | 20                | 2.5               |
| fp8_e4m3fn + 4steps LoRA    | 4               | 1.0               |
